Key Match Events: Kevin De Bruyne sealed the win for Belgium with a late goal
Pre-Game Insights: Romania left more space than Slovakia did
Belgium were unrecognizable from the sluggish side shocked by Slovakia in their opening game
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium manager Domenico Tedesco said the result was good
Romania coach Edward Iordanescu said they need solidarity and unity to deal with difficulty
Miscellaneous Highlights: All four teams in Group E are on equal points after two rounds
The game set up a final round showdown with all four teams in Group E on three points
Romania and Belgium have the advantage with a plus-one goal difference
Others: The game was played in an astonishing atmosphere in Cologne
